TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 888
TEI.2.document_title: Anthony Butler to Stephen F Austin, 11-14-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Anthony Butler to Austin, November 14, 1832. Draft for $14.45.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 888

div1.p: Anthony Butler to Austin, November 14, 1832. Draft for $14.45.
Will please pay Lemuel Crawford or order fourteen Dollars forty five cents for work in building a brick chimney burning lime etc. Nov. 14th 1832.
Jno R. Jones for Col. Anthony Butler
